ComicInfo.Summary:
The debut of Angel's most deadly adversary yet: The Mummy Tramp! Angel and friends end up in Egypt searching for a deadly relic that is key to their survival. But a killer is on the loose in Africa that will turn their journey of discovery into a bloodbath!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Marco Maccagni | 1 | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marco Maccagni | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Michael McComb | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Michael McComb | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 5 | F | Risqué Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 6 |
